QuestData.Title: Blood Oath of the Horde
QuestData.Description: They are ready, $n. These taunka will all willingly join the Horde and give all that they have to see the Scourge driven from this world.$B$B<Brighthoof hands you a scroll bearing the insignia of the Horde.>$B$BWithin this scroll you will find the blood oath of the Horde. Tradition dictates that our new taunka brothers and sisters utter the sacred words herein.$B$BTake the scroll and swear the taunka into the Horde, commander. Return the scroll to me when you have completed your duty.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to the taunka at Westwind Refugee Camp and make 5 of them pledge their allegiance to the Horde.$B$BReturn the Blood Oath of the Horde to Emissary Brighthoof once you have completed this task.
QuestData.CompletionText: They will strengthen the Horde, commander.
QuestData.RewardText: Thank you for doing this, Commander $n. They had nothing left. You have given them purpose and with purpose comes hope... Hope for a new tomorrow... for a new life.
